bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard for Information Technolog --Telecommunications and Information Exchange Between Systems--Local and Metropolitan Area Networks-- Specific Requirements Part 3: Carrier Sense Multiple Access With Collision Detection (CSMA/CD) Access Method and Physical Layer Specifications Amendment: Physical Layer Pecifications and Management Parameters for 10 Gb/s Passive Optical Networks

IEEE Draft Standard for Information Technolog --Telecommunications and Information Exchange Between Systems--Local and Metropolitan Area Networks-- Specific Requirements Part 3: Carrier Sense Multiple Access With Collision Detection (CSMA/CD) Access Method and Physical Layer Specifications Amendment: Physical Layer Pecifications and Management Parameters for 10 Gb/s Passive Optical Networks
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std P802.3av/D3.0, Jan 2009

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This amendment to IEEE Std 802.3-2008 provides physical layer specifications and management parameters for 10G-EPON on point-to-multipoint passive optical networks. 10G-EPON uses the network architecture of IEEE Std 802.3Â¿s 1G-EPON, providing support for both symmetric and asymmetric data rates while maintaining complete backward compatibility with already deployed equipment.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
